name: Lucky Devil!
description:
Lucky Devil!

Short game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Play as a lucky devil and destroy your enemies using the power of luck!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Attack

In current version there are only two Abilities that you pick in the beginning of the game (actually they appear randomly from the list, but maximum is 2, so it shows all). Also there is only one level as we were prototyping a lot and haven't had time left, but we hope it is a promising one, at least for us!
